AVSEC ORDER NO: 04/2014

Subject: Extension _of facility for access to the vehicle of His Holiness Sri Jayendra
Saraswathy Swamigal up to the tarmac of airports

Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. 05/2013 dated 27/05/2013 on the subject cited
above.

2. ‘The competent authority has approved to extend the facility of airport ferry vehicle
upto the tarmac for His Holiness Sri Jayendra Saraswathy Swamigal, Kancheepuram on
medical grounds at all airports in the country for a further period of one year w.c.f. 15/06/2014.
